: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus Prime(via commlink): Well Nightlight...
He couldn't say it at first, it was still unbelievable.
Rodimus Prime(via commlink): The Tripredacus have brought back Optimus Prime, but he is now evil... and he is comeing to Earth.
 airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:Nightlight:

"what do you wanna mean" said confused Nightlight "what could be 
worst than... this...?"
